thread.title: Liam Payne 'renovating his mansion ahead of baby's arrival - with a gym, pool and snooker room'
thread.title_full: Liam Payne 'renovating his mansion ahead of baby's arrival - with a gym, pool and snooker room'

author: Vicki Newman
title: Liam Payne 'renovating his mansion ahead of baby's arrival - with a gym, pool and snooker room'
text:
Cheryl Liam Payne (Photo: Getty) Share Get celebs updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Like most new parents, Liam Payne is said to be renovating his house in anticipation. But, rather than add a nursery or playroom for his child with Cheryl Fernandez-Versini, he's treating himself. 
The Midlands-born star, 23, is said to be upgrading his six-bedroom, Sussex home with a brand new basement gym, swimming pool and super-sized snooker room for maximum entertainment value. 
According to a report in The Sun , construction work is already underway after planning permission was granted, earlier this year. 
The Mirror have contacted a representative for Liam, but are yet to receive a response. If the claims are true, the 1D star will no doubt he hoping the work is completed by March, which is when their newborn is due. Read More
